content: vagina pad holder copywrite january 27 2008 cora shaw this was crocheted to fit both a bottle of pamprin get killer cramps and stayfree prima overnight pads you may want to measure and adjust the chain accordingly materials yarn o sport weight yarn skin color i used patons astra-apricot o eyelash yarn- hair color i used patons cha-cha-chocolate appears to be discontinued crochet hooks o us b/2 75 mm-to be used with the sport weight yarn o us c/3 00 mm to be used with the eyelash yarn gauge 10 single_crochet for 12 row=2 inches/5 cm finished measurement bottom 1 ½ inches/4cm across the bottom back 4-inches/10 cm front bottom from hair 3 1/4 inches/8 cm front bottom including hair 3 ½ inches/9 cm front top from hair 1 ½ inches/4 cm front top including hair 2 ¼ inches/ 5 ½ cm chain 27 foundation round working through the bump of the chain 2 single_crochet in the second chain from hook single_crochet in the next 23 bumps 2 single_crochet in the next bump 3 single_crochet in the end chain do not turn continuing working in the chains of the row just made 2 single_crochet in the next chain single_crochet in the next 23 chains 3 single_crochet in the end chain join to
